Meating Burgers

Landing page
about the project

Meating Burgers is a burger place that we made sure to nail the atmosphere on, and to cover all aspects of the menu in a convenient manner. All combined we guaranteed to sell the customer on the quality and experience.

Industry: culinary

Tech Stack: Project management, Back-end development, Ux/ui Designer, Front-end development, QA, DevOps

Mobile version

We convert the layout and information into a sleek mobile experience, it retains the style and still communicates clearly and smoothly on all devices.

meating burgers ads

Maintaining the style further we deliver appetizing promo to sell the experience, combined with the website thoroughly selling the location, and entice people to try the food.

Typography & colors
black Confetti Cocoa Brown
Result

Our website and promo makes sure to interest the customer and learn about the menu, all wrapped up in a warm and inviting style. To anyone who is interested in trying a burger place will definitely be incentivized to give it a try.
